clauses: I am a software developer with a passion for web development and data science.
I firmly believe it takes not only functionalities but also looks and feel to make a product complete; as such, my interests lie in full-stack development, machine learning, and data analysis.
I enjoy learning and exploring new technologies because I believe, as a developer, technology shouldn't be a constraint.

timeline.title: BSc. Computer Science
timeline.description: Completed a bachelor in computer science at the University of Buea (Cameroon).

timeline.title: Code maintainer
timeline.description: Contributed to the extension of the open-source project coala.io, through the google summer of code program.

timeline.title: Freelance developer
timeline.description: Was hired and worked on a few web development projects as a full stack developer.

timeline.title: MSc. Web and Data Science
timeline.description: At the University of Koblenz Landau (Germany).
